alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 8:32PM EDT until July 20 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Delaware County in central Ohio... Northwestern Licking County in central Ohio... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 832 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sunbury, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Westerville, Delaware, Granville, Powell, Johnstown, Sunbury, Utica, Granville South, Polaris, Galena, Alexandria, Hartford, Interstate 71 at US Route 36/State Route 37, Alum Creek State Park, Fredonia, US Route 62 at State Route 661, Olive Green, Center Village, Kilbourne and Lewis Center. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 122 and 138. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
